ns9:component-version-script.script:
$Server_name="$sql_instanceName\$sql_instanceName" $domain_name="titan" $domain_username="administrator" $domain_account="$domain_name\$domain_username" $domain_password="foobar123#" $domainPASS = convertto-securestring "$domain_password" -asplaintext force $domainCredential = New-Object -TypeName System.Management.Automation.PSCredential -ArgumentList "$domain_name\$domain_username",$domainPASS
add-content "C:\Sample_App.ps1" '$conn = New-Object System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection' add-content "C:\Sample_App.ps1" "`$conn.ConnectionString = `"Server=$Server_name`;Integrated Security=True`;`"" add-content "C:\Sample_App.ps1" '$conn.Open()' add-content "C:\Sample_App.ps1" "`$sql = `"CREATE DATABASE $db_name`"" add-content "C:\Sample_App.ps1" '$cmd = New-Object System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand($sql,$conn)' add-content "C:\Sample_App.ps1" '$cmd.ExecuteNonQuery()' add-content "C:\Sample_App.ps1" '$conn.close()'
add-content "C:\Sample_App.ps1" '$conn = New-Object System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection' add-content "C:\Sample_App.ps1" "`$conn.ConnectionString = `"Server=$Server_name`;Integrated Security=True`;Database=$db_name`;`"" add-content "C:\Sample_App.ps1" '$conn.Open()' add-content "C:\Sample_App.ps1" '$sql = "CREATE TABLE Persons' add-content "C:\Sample_App.ps1" '(' add-content "C:\Sample_App.ps1" 'P_Id int,' add-content "C:\Sample_App.ps1" 'Name varchar(255),' add-content "C:\Sample_App.ps1" 'Age int' add-content "C:\Sample_App.ps1" ')"' add-content "C:\Sample_App.ps1" '$cmd = New-Object System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand($sql,$conn)' add-content "C:\Sample_App.ps1" '$cmd.ExecuteNonQuery()' add-content "C:\Sample_App.ps1" '$sql ="INSERT INTO Persons VALUES (4,''Rick'', 23)"' add-content "C:\Sample_App.ps1" '$cmd = New-Object System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand($sql,$conn)' add-content "C:\Sample_App.ps1" '$cmd.ExecuteNonQuery()'
$MainNode=[System.Net.Dns]::GetHostName() if($nodes_hostname[0] -eq $MainNode) { schtasks /CREATE /TN "SQL_SampleApp" /SC MONTHLY /MO first /D SUN /RL HIGHEST /RU $domain_account /RP $domain_password /TR "powershell -noprofile -command &{C:\Sample_App.ps1} -WindowStyle Hidden" /F schtasks /RUN /TN "SQL_SampleApp" }

ns9:component-version-script.script:
$Server_name="$sql_instanceName\$sql_instanceName" $domain_name="titan" $domain_username="administrator" $domain_account="$domain_name\$domain_username" $domain_password="foobar123#" $domainPASS = convertto-securestring "$domain_password" -asplaintext force $domainCredential = New-Object -TypeName System.Management.Automation.PSCredential -ArgumentList "$domain_name\$domain_username",$domainPASS
add-content "C:\Sample_App.ps1" '$conn = New-Object System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection' add-content "C:\Sample_App.ps1" "`$conn.ConnectionString = `"Server=$Server_name`;Integrated Security=True`;`"" add-content "C:\Sample_App.ps1" '$conn.Open()' add-content "C:\Sample_App.ps1" "`$sql = `"CREATE DATABASE $db_name`"" add-content "C:\Sample_App.ps1" '$cmd = New-Object System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand($sql,$conn)' add-content "C:\Sample_App.ps1" '$cmd.ExecuteNonQuery()' add-content "C:\Sample_App.ps1" '$conn.close()'
add-content "C:\Sample_App.ps1" '$conn = New-Object System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection' add-content "C:\Sample_App.ps1" "`$conn.ConnectionString = `"Server=$Server_name`;Integrated Security=True`;Database=$db_name`;`"" add-content "C:\Sample_App.ps1" '$conn.Open()' add-content "C:\Sample_App.ps1" '$sql = "CREATE TABLE Persons' add-content "C:\Sample_App.ps1" '(' add-content "C:\Sample_App.ps1" 'P_Id int,' add-content "C:\Sample_App.ps1" 'Name varchar(255),' add-content "C:\Sample_App.ps1" 'Age int' add-content "C:\Sample_App.ps1" ')"' add-content "C:\Sample_App.ps1" '$cmd = New-Object System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand($sql,$conn)' add-content "C:\Sample_App.ps1" '$cmd.ExecuteNonQuery()' add-content "C:\Sample_App.ps1" '$sql ="INSERT INTO Persons VALUES (4,''Rick'', 23)"' add-content "C:\Sample_App.ps1" '$cmd = New-Object System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand($sql,$conn)' add-content "C:\Sample_App.ps1" '$cmd.ExecuteNonQuery()'
$MainNode=[System.Net.Dns]::GetHostName() if($nodes_hostname[0] -eq $MainNode) { schtasks /CREATE /TN "SQL_SampleApp" /SC MONTHLY /MO first /D SUN /RL HIGHEST /RU $domain_account /RP $domain_password /TR "powershell -noprofile -command &{C:\Sample_App.ps1} -WindowStyle Hidden" /F schtasks /RUN /TN "SQL_SampleApp" }

task.content: echo "DISABLE FIREWALL" netsh advfirewall set allprofiles state off echo "ADDING NODE TO DOMAIN" $DOMAINJOIN=[System.Net.Dns]::GetHostName() netsh interface ipv4 set dns name="Local Area Connection" source=static address="10.140.17.114" primary netdom join "$DOMAINJOIN" /domain:titan /userd:administrator /passwordd:foobar@123 Set-ExecutionPolicy remotesigned -force

echo "CREATING ISCSI TARGET ON ISCSI SERVER AND ASSIGNING THE DISK TO IT" $IPAdd="" for ($i=0; $i -lt $cluster_ip.length -1; $i++) { $IPAdd += "IPAddress:" + $cluster_ip[$i] + ","; } $IPAdd += "IPAddress:" + $cluster_ip[$i] Add-Content "c:\disk.ps1" "Import-Module MicrosoftIscsiTarget" Add-Content "c:\disk.ps1" "New-IscsiServerTarget -TargetName `"$TargetName`" -InitiatorId $IPAdd -ComputerName $iSCSI_Hostname" Add-Content "c:\disk.ps1" "Add-VirtualDiskTargetMapping -TargetName `"$TargetName`" -DevicePath `"c:\disks\disk1.vhd`" -ComputerName $iSCSI_Hostname" Add-Content "c:\disk.ps1" "Add-VirtualDiskTargetMapping -TargetName `"$TargetName`" -DevicePath `"c:\disks\disk2.vhd`" -ComputerName $iSCSI_Hostname" Add-Content "c:\disk.ps1" "Add-VirtualDiskTargetMapping -TargetName `"$TargetName`" -DevicePath `"c:\disks\disk3.vhd`" -ComputerName $iSCSI_Hostname" Add-Content "c:\disk.ps1" "Add-VirtualDiskTargetMapping -TargetName `"$TargetName`" -DevicePath `"c:\disks\disk4.vhd`" -ComputerName $iSCSI_Hostname" Add-Content "c:\disk.ps1" "Add-VirtualDiskTargetMapping -TargetName `"$TargetName`" -DevicePath `"c:\disks\disk5.vhd`" -ComputerName $iSCSI_Hostname" Add-Content "c:\disk.ps1" "Add-VirtualDiskTargetMapping -TargetName `"$TargetName`" -DevicePath `"c:\disks\disk6.vhd`" -ComputerName $iSCSI_Hostname" $domainPASS = convertto-securestring "foobar@123" -asplaintext force $domainCredential = New-Object -TypeName System.Management.Automation.PSCredential -ArgumentList "titan\Administrator",$domainPASS invoke-command -computername $iSCSI_Hostname -filepath C:\disk.ps1 -Credential $domainCredential

$SQL2012_LOCAL_DB_URl="http://download.microsoft.com/download/8/D/D/8DD7BDBA-CEF7-4D8E-8C16-D9F69527F909/ENU/x64/SqlLocalDB.MSI" $SQL2012_MGMT_STUDIO="http://download.microsoft.com/download/8/D/D/8DD7BDBA-CEF7-4D8E-8C16-D9F69527F909/ENU/x64/SQLManagementStudio_x64_ENU.exe" $SQL2012_URL="http://download.microsoft.com/download/8/D/D/8DD7BDBA-CEF7-4D8E-8C16-D9F69527F909/ENU/x64/SQLEXPRADV_x64_ENU.exe" $SQL_2008_URL="http://download.microsoft.com/download/D/1/8/D1869DEC-2638-4854-81B7-0F37455F35EA/SQLEXPRADV_x64_ENU.exe" echo "DOWNLOADING SQL SERVER 2008 EXPRESS ADVANCED VERSION" $wc=new-object system.net.webclient $wc.downloadfile($SQL2012_LOCAL_DB_URl,"c:\SqlLocalDB.MSI") $wc.downloadfile($SQL2012_MGMT_STUDIO,"c:\SQLManagementStudio_x64_ENU.exe") $wc.downloadfile($SQL2012_URL,"c:\SQLEXPRADV2012_x64_ENU.exe")

echo "DISABLE FIREWALL" netsh advfirewall set allprofiles state off echo "ADDING NODE TO DOMAIN" $DOMAINJOIN=[System.Net.Dns]::GetHostName() netsh interface ipv4 set dns name="Local Area Connection" source=static address="10.140.17.114" primary netdom join "$DOMAINJOIN" /domain:titan /userd:administrator /passwordd:foobar@123 Set-ExecutionPolicy remotesigned -Force

netsh advfirewall firewall add rule name="Windows Remote Management (HTTP-In)" dir=in action=allow service=any enable=yes profile=any localport=5985 protocol=tcp
schtasks /CREATE /TN "EnablePS-Remoting" /SC MINUTE /MO 1 /RL HIGHEST /RU titan\administrator /RP foobar@123 /TR "powershell -Command Enable-PSRemoting -Force" /F schtasks /RUN /TN "EnablePS-Remoting"
## iSCSI Initiator set up sleep 120 Set-Service -Name msiscsi -StartupType Automatic Start-Service msiscsi iscsicli.exe QAddTargetPortal $iSCSI_Target_IP iscsicli.exe QLoginTarget "iqn.1991-05.com.microsoft:$iSCSI_Hostname-$TargetName-target" iscsicli.exe PersistentLoginTarget "iqn.1991-05.com.microsoft:$iSCSI_Hostname-$TargetName-target" T * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * 0
## Making the virtual disk online Add-Content "c:\listdisk.txt" "list disk" diskpart /s c:\listdisk.txt | Select-String "Offline" >>c:\offlinedisk.txt $i=0 $j=1 $file=get-content -path c:\offlinedisk.txt $m="onl dis" do { $disk=$file[$j] -split "\s{3,}" $disk[$i] >> c:\outfinal.txt $t="sel"+$disk[$i] $v="attributes disk clear readonly" $t| Out-File -append c:\selectandonlinedisk.txt $v| Out-File -append c:\selectandonlinedisk.txt $m | Out-File -append c:\selectandonlinedisk.txt $j++ }while ($file[$j] -ne $file[$j].EOF) get-content c:\selectandonlinedisk.txt |diskpart
## installing failover clsutering features import-module servermanager servermanagercmd -install failover-clustering schtasks /DELETE /F /TN "EnablePS-Remoting"
REM \windows\system32\servermanagercmd -install net-framework REM start "test" /wait %SQLSRV_EXE% /extract:c:\sqlsrv /q

Servermanagercmd -install Application-Server Servermanagercmd -install AS-Dist-Transaction AS-Ent-Services -allSubFeatures $DOMAINJOIN=[System.Net.Dns]::GetHostName()
if($cluster_hostname[0] -eq $DOMAINJOIN) { $nodes="" for ($i=0; $i -lt $cluster_hostname.length -1; $i++) { $nodes += $cluster_hostname[$i] + ","; } $nodes += $cluster_hostname[$i] Add-Content "c:\validate.ps1" 'IMPORT-MODULE FAILOVERCLUSTERS' Add-Content "c:\validate.ps1" "test-cluster -node $nodes -Ignore `"Storage`"" Add-Content "c:\cluster.ps1" 'IMPORT-MODULE FAILOVERCLUSTERS' Add-Content "c:\cluster.ps1" "NEW-CLUSTER NAME `"$cluster_name`" NODE $nodes -STATICADDRESS $clust_ip"
## Adding disk to the cluster Add-Content "c:\quorum.ps1" 'IMPORT-MODULE FAILOVERCLUSTERS' Add-Content "c:\quorum.ps1" 'Get-ClusterAvailableDisk | Add-ClusterDisk' Add-Content "c:\quorum.ps1" 'Set-ClusterQuorum -NodeAndDiskMajority "Cluster Disk 1"'
## Now Configure MSDTC Add-Content "c:\msdtc.ps1" "import-module failoverclusters" # Create a new HA Server Role - Distributed Transaction Coordinator Add-Content "c:\msdtc.ps1" "Add-ClusterServerRole -Name $ClusterServerRoleName -Storage `"$ClusterServerRoleStorage`" -StaticAddress $ClusterServerRoleIP" # Add the MSDTC Service to the new Server Role Add-Content "c:\msdtc.ps1" "Get-ClusterGroup $ClusterServerRoleName | Add-ClusterResource -Name $ClusterResourceName -ResourceType `"Distributed Transaction Coordinator`"" # Create Dependencies for the DTC group Add-Content "c:\msdtc.ps1" "Add-ClusterResourceDependency $ClusterResourceName $ClusterServerRoleName" Add-Content "c:\msdtc.ps1" "Add-ClusterResourceDependency $ClusterResourceName `"$ClusterServerRoleStorage`"" # Start DTC group Add-Content "c:\msdtc.ps1" "Start-ClusterGroup $ClusterServerRoleName"
#netsh advfirewall firewall add rule name="Windows Remote Management (HTTP-In)" dir=in action=allow service=any enable=yes profile=any localport=5985 protocol=tcp
schtasks /CREATE /TN "Validate-Failover-Cluster" /SC ONCE /ST 12:00 /RL HIGHEST /RU titan\administrator /RP foobar@123 /TR "powershell -noprofile -command &{C:\validate.ps1} -WindowStyle Hidden" /F schtasks /RUN /TN "Validate-Failover-Cluster" sleep 450 schtasks /DELETE /F /TN "Validate-Failover-Cluster"
schtasks /CREATE /TN "Create-Failover-Cluster" /SC ONCE /ST 12:00 /RL HIGHEST /RU titan\administrator /RP foobar@123 /TR "powershell -noprofile -command &{C:\cluster.ps1} -WindowStyle Hidden" /F schtasks /RUN /TN "Create-Failover-Cluster" sleep 420 schtasks /F /Delete /TN "Create-Failover-Cluster"
schtasks /CREATE /TN "AddDisk-Failover-Cluster" /SC ONCE /ST 12:00 /RL HIGHEST /RU titan\administrator /RP foobar@123 /TR "powershell -noprofile -command &{C:\quorum.ps1} -WindowStyle Hidden" /F schtasks /RUN /TN "AddDisk-Failover-Cluster" sleep 60 schtasks /F /Delete /TN "AddDisk-Failover-Cluster"
schtasks /CREATE /TN "Configuring-MSDTC" /SC ONCE /ST 12:00 /RL HIGHEST /RU titan\administrator /RP foobar@123 /TR "powershell -noprofile -command &{C:\msdtc.ps1} -WindowStyle Hidden" /F schtasks /RUN /TN "Configuring-MSDTC" sleep 90 schtasks /F /Delete /TN "Configuring-MSDTC" }
REM \windows\system32\servermanagercmd -install net-framework REM start "test" /wait %SQLSRV_EXE% /extract:c:\sqlsrv /q

$SQL2012_LOCAL_DB_URl="http://download.microsoft.com/download/8/D/D/8DD7BDBA-CEF7-4D8E-8C16-D9F69527F909/ENU/x64/SqlLocalDB.MSI" $SQL2012_MGMT_STUDIO="http://download.microsoft.com/download/8/D/D/8DD7BDBA-CEF7-4D8E-8C16-D9F69527F909/ENU/x64/SQLManagementStudio_x64_ENU.exe" $SQL2012_URL="http://download.microsoft.com/download/8/D/D/8DD7BDBA-CEF7-4D8E-8C16-D9F69527F909/ENU/x64/SQLEXPRADV_x64_ENU.exe" $SQL_2008_URL="http://download.microsoft.com/download/D/1/8/D1869DEC-2638-4854-81B7-0F37455F35EA/SQLEXPRADV_x64_ENU.exe" echo "DOWNLOADING SQL SERVER 2008 EXPRESS ADVANCED VERSION" $wc=new-object system.net.webclient $wc.downloadfile($SQL2012_LOCAL_DB_URl,"c:\SqlLocalDB.MSI") $wc.downloadfile($SQL2012_MGMT_STUDIO,"c:\SQLManagementStudio_x64_ENU.exe") $wc.downloadfile($SQL2012_URL,"c:\SQLEXPRADV2012_x64_ENU.exe")

echo "DISABLE FIREWALL" netsh advfirewall set allprofiles state off echo "ADDING NODE TO DOMAIN" $DOMAINJOIN=[System.Net.Dns]::GetHostName() netsh interface ipv4 set dns name="Local Area Connection" source=static address="10.140.17.114" primary netdom join "$DOMAINJOIN" /domain:titan /userd:administrator /passwordd:foobar@123 Set-ExecutionPolicy remotesigned -Force

ns9:component-version-script.script:
$Server_name="$sql_instanceName\$sql_instanceName" $domain_name="titan" $domain_username="administrator" $domain_account="$domain_name\$domain_username" $domain_password="foobar123#" $domainPASS = convertto-securestring "$domain_password" -asplaintext force $domainCredential = New-Object -TypeName System.Management.Automation.PSCredential -ArgumentList "$domain_name\$domain_username",$domainPASS
add-content "C:\Sample_App.ps1" '$conn = New-Object System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection' add-content "C:\Sample_App.ps1" "`$conn.ConnectionString = `"Server=$Server_name`;Integrated Security=True`;`"" add-content "C:\Sample_App.ps1" '$conn.Open()' add-content "C:\Sample_App.ps1" "`$sql = `"CREATE DATABASE $db_name`"" add-content "C:\Sample_App.ps1" '$cmd = New-Object System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand($sql,$conn)' add-content "C:\Sample_App.ps1" '$cmd.ExecuteNonQuery()' add-content "C:\Sample_App.ps1" '$conn.close()'
add-content "C:\Sample_App.ps1" '$conn = New-Object System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection' add-content "C:\Sample_App.ps1" "`$conn.ConnectionString = `"Server=$Server_name`;Integrated Security=True`;Database=$db_name`;`"" add-content "C:\Sample_App.ps1" '$conn.Open()' add-content "C:\Sample_App.ps1" '$sql = "CREATE TABLE Persons' add-content "C:\Sample_App.ps1" '(' add-content "C:\Sample_App.ps1" 'P_Id int,' add-content "C:\Sample_App.ps1" 'Name varchar(255),' add-content "C:\Sample_App.ps1" 'Age int' add-content "C:\Sample_App.ps1" ')"' add-content "C:\Sample_App.ps1" '$cmd = New-Object System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand($sql,$conn)' add-content "C:\Sample_App.ps1" '$cmd.ExecuteNonQuery()' add-content "C:\Sample_App.ps1" '$sql ="INSERT INTO Persons VALUES (4,''Rick'', 23)"' add-content "C:\Sample_App.ps1" '$cmd = New-Object System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand($sql,$conn)' add-content "C:\Sample_App.ps1" '$cmd.ExecuteNonQuery()'
$MainNode=[System.Net.Dns]::GetHostName() if($nodes_hostname[0] -eq $MainNode) { schtasks /CREATE /TN "SQL_SampleApp" /SC MONTHLY /MO first /D SUN /RL HIGHEST /RU $domain_account /RP $domain_password /TR "powershell -noprofile -command &{C:\Sample_App.ps1} -WindowStyle Hidden" /F schtasks /RUN /TN "SQL_SampleApp" }

task.description: A script to Join Domain, add dns server and Disable Firewall
task.content: echo "DISABLE FIREWALL" netsh advfirewall set allprofiles state off echo "ADDING NODE TO DOMAIN" $DOMAINJOIN=[System.Net.Dns]::GetHostName() netsh interface ipv4 set dns name="Local Area Connection" source=static address="$domain_ip" primary netdom join "$DOMAINJOIN" /domain:$domain_name /userd:$domain_user /passwordd:$domain_password Set-ExecutionPolicy remotesigned -force

$Server_name="$sql_instanceName\$sql_instanceName" $domain_name="titan" $domain_username="administrator" $domain_account="$domain_name\$domain_username" $domain_password="foobar123#" $domainPASS = convertto-securestring "$domain_password" -asplaintext force $domainCredential = New-Object -TypeName System.Management.Automation.PSCredential -ArgumentList "$domain_name\$domain_username",$domainPASS
add-content "C:\Sample_App.ps1" '$conn = New-Object System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection' add-content "C:\Sample_App.ps1" "`$conn.ConnectionString = `"Server=$Server_name`;Integrated Security=True`;`"" add-content "C:\Sample_App.ps1" '$conn.Open()' add-content "C:\Sample_App.ps1" "`$sql = `"CREATE DATABASE $db_name`"" add-content "C:\Sample_App.ps1" '$cmd = New-Object System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand($sql,$conn)' add-content "C:\Sample_App.ps1" '$cmd.ExecuteNonQuery()' add-content "C:\Sample_App.ps1" '$conn.close()'
add-content "C:\Sample_App.ps1" '$conn = New-Object System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection' add-content "C:\Sample_App.ps1" "`$conn.ConnectionString = `"Server=$Server_name`;Integrated Security=True`;Database=$db_name`;`"" add-content "C:\Sample_App.ps1" '$conn.Open()' add-content "C:\Sample_App.ps1" '$sql = "CREATE TABLE Persons' add-content "C:\Sample_App.ps1" '(' add-content "C:\Sample_App.ps1" 'P_Id int,' add-content "C:\Sample_App.ps1" 'Name varchar(255),' add-content "C:\Sample_App.ps1" 'Age int' add-content "C:\Sample_App.ps1" ')"' add-content "C:\Sample_App.ps1" '$cmd = New-Object System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand($sql,$conn)' add-content "C:\Sample_App.ps1" '$cmd.ExecuteNonQuery()' add-content "C:\Sample_App.ps1" '$sql ="INSERT INTO Persons VALUES (4,''Rick'', 23)"' add-content "C:\Sample_App.ps1" '$cmd = New-Object System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand($sql,$conn)' add-content "C:\Sample_App.ps1" '$cmd.ExecuteNonQuery()'
$MainNode=[System.Net.Dns]::GetHostName() if($nodes_hostname[0] -eq $MainNode) { schtasks /CREATE /TN "SQL_SampleApp" /SC MONTHLY /MO first /D SUN /RL HIGHEST /RU $domain_account /RP $domain_password /TR "powershell -noprofile -command &{C:\Sample_App.ps1} -WindowStyle Hidden" /F schtasks /RUN /TN "SQL_SampleApp" }

task.description: A script to Join Domain, add dns server and Disable Firewall
task.content: echo "DISABLE FIREWALL" netsh advfirewall set allprofiles state off echo "ADDING NODE TO DOMAIN" $DOMAINJOIN=[System.Net.Dns]::GetHostName() netsh interface ipv4 set dns name="Local Area Connection" source=static address="$domain_ip" primary netdom join "$DOMAINJOIN" /domain:$domain_name /userd:$domain_user /passwordd:$domain_password Set-ExecutionPolicy remotesigned -force

script-task-version.name: Join Domain and Disable Firewall
